# ‚≠êÔ∏èOverview

This file creates a codebook for combined_participant_data.rds, which is created in `data_survey_21_merge.Rmd`.


# üì¶Load packages

```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(readr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(codebookr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
install.packages("flextable")
library(shiny, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
```


# üì•Import data

* combined_participant_data.rds was created in `data_survey_21_merge.Rmd`, cleaned in `data_survey_22_calculated_columns.Rmd`.

```{r}
path <- "../Participant Data/R Data/combined_participant_data.rds"
```

```{r}
combined_participant_data <- read_rds(path)
```

# Add column attributes

```{r}
label <- function(col, label) {
  df <- get("combined_participant_data", envir = .GlobalEnv)
  attributes(df[[col]])$label <- label
  assign("combined_participant_data", df, envir = .GlobalEnv)
}
```

Find and replace

* label\(\"(\w+)\", ?(\".+\")\)
* cb_add_col_attributes(\n  \1, \n  description = \2\n) %>%\n


```{r}
combined_participant_data <- combined_participant_data %>%
  cb_add_col_attributes(
  id, 
  description = "Subject ID"
) %>%
  
cb_add_col_attributes(
  date_visit, 
  description = "Date of visit"
) %>%
  
cb_add_col_attributes(
  ml_hispanic, 
  description = "Master log hispanic"
)
```
